00006 static void get_max(void) 
00007 {
00008         void *buf;
00009         int order;
00010 
00011         for (order = 12; order >= 0; --order){
00012                 buf = __get_free_pages(GFP_KERNEL, order);
00013                 if (buf){
00014                         printk(KERN_ALERT "%2d [0x%08x bytes] SUCCESS\n",
00015                                order, (1<<order)*4096);
00016                         break;
00017                 }else{
00018                         printk(KERN_ALERT "%2d [0x%08x bytes] FAIL\n",
00019                                order, (1<<order)*4096);
00020                 }
00021         }
00022 }
